metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Mado Kara Mieru is more basic than the typical song, having below average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Mado Kara Mieru has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Minor, C Minor,  and D Lydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!

metadata.editComments: The weirdness at the start of line 3 is because you can't have notes trailing across line boundaries
